p: For instance, the median daily R 0 in Wuhan declined from 2.35 a week before the introduction of travel restrictions (January 23, 2020) to 1.05 one week later. The study used a stochastic transmission model of CoV-2 transmission with four datasets from within and outside Wuhan and estimated how transmission in Wuhan varied between December 2019 and February 2020 (Kucharski et al. 2020).
